mapper.select: select nvl(max(ref),0) ref from comments where epinum=#{epinum}
select nvl(max(step),0) step from comments where epinum=#{epinum} and ref=#{ref}

select c.*,u.nickname,u.profileimg,nvl(cntlike,0) cntlike,nvl(cnthate,0) cnthate,nvl(type,0) mytype from comments c, users u, (select count(*) cntlike,commnum from commlikes where type=1 group by commnum) cl, (select count(*) cnthate,commnum from commlikes where type=2 group by commnum) ch, (select type,commnum from commlikes where usernum=#{usernum}) mt where epinum=#{epinum} and c.usernum=u.usernum and c.commnum=mt.commnum(+) and c.commnum=cl.commnum(+) and c.commnum=ch.commnum(+) order by c.ref desc, c.step asc
